岔.definition: fork in road; bifurcation; branch in road, river, mountain range etc; to branch off; to turn off; to diverge; to stray (from the path); to change the subject; to interrupt; to stagger (times)

岔調.definition: (of a voice) husky; hoarse; affected; (music) to go off-key

岔開.definition: to diverge; to branch off the road; to change (the subject)
